title: account transfer
body: the transfers are locked? bcs i didnt see anywhere option to trasnfer, only to change my summoner name, i long on my both account and nothing ( i think it was bug on 1 acc so i check other ) if they locked, when they will be able again ?

replies.body: Those account transfers are still locked while the end of season approaches. They'll be back up on [**Nov 20**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown).
